str2: To fornicate; met: I practice idolatry. From porne; to act the harlot, i.e. indulge unlawful lust, or practise idolatry.

str2: To live luxuriously, revel, riot. From a presumed derivative of strenos; to be luxurious.

str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

str2: To weep, weep for, mourn, lament. Of uncertain affinity; to sob, i.e. Wail aloud.

str2: A primary verb; to 'chop'; specially, to beat the breast in grief.
